ygData.subject: Re: Eye Of Zomm
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, actually the spell can go through doors.  I recently had lots of fun exploring befallen with my eye of zomm, whenever I reached one of the doors I just
ygData.messageBody:
Well, actually the spell can go through doors. I recently had lots of fun exploring befallen with my eye of zomm, whenever I reached one of the doors I just moved my eye up to it and it automatically opened. The spell isn't one of the greatest for usefullness but it can be a lot of fun. All in all I'm not sorry I bought it :)

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee <kenlee@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 12:30 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Eye Of Zomm


You just wasted 3 plat. It's worth it though, because of the reaction people have seing this veincovered eyeball floating around. One guy ran screaming from it, saying that there were floating eyes (a known high lvl monster) in Black Burrow. Killed myself laughing.

The spell doesn't last long enough to be useful, can't go through doors, and can't see in the dark. i.e. useless. Just fun

Zalbar
-----Original Message-----
From: Don Bickner <bick@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: 18 avril, 1999 12:45
Subject: [eq_wizards] Eye Of Zomm


Hello everyone,
Has anyone found a good use for the eye of Zomm Spell.I hope I didnt just waste 3 plat.

Kueken 8 lvl wizard----Mithaniel Marr.
